subtitle: Delicious creamy dessert that is quick to make. To save time it may be made in advance and kept in the fridge. You could make this dessert in individual dishes.

method.text: Peel and core apples and cut into chunks. Put into large pan with the lemon juice and 1 tablespoon water. Cook for about 8 min, stirring a few times, until tender but still quite chunky. Remove from heat and stir in <sup>1</sup>/<sub>3</sub> of the sugar. Transfer to a bowl and allow to cool. Chill until needed.
Fold the raspberries into the apple and turn into a shallow serving dish.
Mix both of the fromage frais together. Spoon over the fruit evenly, creating a slight swirled effect. Scatter over remaining sugar.
Chill for 10 min, until sugar has dissolved. Serve any time.

title: Apple and raspberry cream
